recipes.name: Avocado Toast (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado, spread on toast, sprinkle salt, pepper, and lemon juice.

recipes.name: Pancakes (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients into batter, cook pancakes on a skillet until golden.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients and serve chilled.

recipes.name: BLT Sandwich (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Layer bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo between bread slices.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken, grill until cooked through.

recipes.name: Veggie Burger (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Assemble patty and veggies in bun and serve.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, shape dough into cookies, bake until golden.

recipes.name: Apple Pie (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Prepare crust, fill with apple mixture, bake until crust is golden.

recipes.name: Brownies (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, bake in a pan until firm.
